subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets lost a two-run lead in the eighth inning and again failed to muster a comeback, losing to the Cardinals in a game where the chances for victory were there for the Mets' taking.
snippet: The Mets lost a two-run lead in the eighth inning and again failed to muster a comeback, losing to the Cardinals in a game where the chances for victory were there for the Mets' taking.
